lead_paragraph: The promised raise will take average hourly pay to $13.38 from $13 now for full-time workers beginning Feb. 20, part of an effort to retain workers as joblessness falls.

headline.print_headline: Walmart to Give Pay Raises Next Month
headline.main: Walmart to Deliver Pay Raises Next Month

snippet: The promised raise will take average hourly pay to $13.38 from $13 now for full-time workers beginning Feb. 20, part of an effort to retain workers as joblessness falls.
abstract: Walmart will give pay raises to most United States employees, to average of $13.38 per hour for full-time workers.
